Name: Cheryl Wang
Mission: Staff Development is focused on ensuring the second part of the Spectator mission--staff growth and development. We strongly believe that what our staff get out of their Spectator experience is as important as the content we provide.
Description: Staff development focuses on everything but day to day content. Because aren't involved in production, we can focus our attention fully on what makes Spectator great--our staff. We work on everything from onboarding to events to admin management.
